oai_dc:dc.dc:description: taʼlīf Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaghīr al-Shinjīṭī al-Tashītī ; bi-taṣḥīḥ wa-muqābalat Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad Gannūn.

Bound with: Sarīyat al-ḥaqq wa-al-intiṣār wa-al-dhabb ʻan awliyāʼ Allāh al-akhyār / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṣaghīr al-Shinjīṭī -- al-ʻAḍb al-yamānī fī al-radd Shaykhinā Sīdī Aḥmad al-Tījānī / Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Tījānī -- Risālat Bulūgh al-amānī fī manāqib Sīdī Aḥmad al-Tījānī / Aḥmad Adīb al-Makkī.
